message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $12000 to you and we're confident it will meet all your needs. To make this opportunity more appealing, I'm offering it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $8000 for it.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to negotiate further. For this amazing product, I propose a price of $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.
I'm glad we're able to continue discussing this, Bob. I'm committed to finding a fair solution for both of us. For the product, I propose a price of $8750.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a price of $8600 for the product.
I appreciate your patience and understanding, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I believe we can reach an agreement. For the product, I propose a price of $8650.
